ComicInfo.Title: A New York Knight
ComicInfo.Summary:
When a slippery foe disappears into the streets and alleyways of Brooklyn, the Realm Knights turn to Robyn for help. Together with Masumi, Earth's Knight, they traverse the darkest corners of Brooklyn's underbelly. From Brighton Beach and Bushwick to Cobble Hill and Flatbush, Robyn and Masumi follow the trail of death and destruction left by this villain, racing to find him before his evil machinations change New York forever.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Riveiro & Grostieta | 1 | B | Cover B | Pasquale Qualano & Ylenia Di Napoli | 2 | C | Cover C | Alfredo Reyes & Ceci de la Cruz | 3 | D | Cover D | Salvatore Cuffari & Hedwin Zaldivar | 4 | E | Cosplay Exclusive Cover, Limited to 350 | Elias Chatzoudis | Missing |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-12-02 18:20:00. [CVDB576691]
ComicInfo.Penciller: David Lorenzo Riveiro, Marc Rosete, Sergio Ariño
ComicInfo.Inker: David Lorenzo Riveiro, Marc Rosete, Sergio Ariño
ComicInfo.Colorist: Bryan Valenza, Dono Almara, Ulises Grostieta
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Alfredo Reyes, Ceci de la Cruz, David Lorenzo Riveiro, Elias Chatzoudis, Hedwin Jimenez Zaldivar, Pasquale Qualano, Salvatore Cuffari, Ulises Grostieta, Ylenia DiNapoli
ComicInfo.Locations: Brooklyn, New York City, New York State
